title: Speedvagen Surprise Me goes full CMYK to tease a printer’s process out of the painter
content:
Speedvagen finishes on their fully custom bike builds are always impressive, and this year’s Surprise Me series is no different, getting more detailed than ever in a full CMYK bleed. Nothing Vanilla here… Taking inspiration from the printing backgrounds of their fabrication & painting team, each 2021-2022 Speedvagen Surprise Me bike will painstakingly recreate classic […]

The post Speedvagen Surprise Me goes full CMYK to tease a printer’s process out of the painter appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
